text:
ISBN-13: 9781579126278.
ISBN-10: 1579126278.
Title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd.
Subtitle: A Hercule Poirot Mystery.
Authors: Agatha Christie.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=vipSK5f4hbgC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A widow's sudden suicide sparks rumors that she murdered her first husband, was being blackmailed, and was carrying on a secrey affair with the wealthy Roger Ackroyd. The following evening, Ackroyd is murdered in his locked study, but not before receiving a letter identifying the widow's blackmailer. Kings Abbot is crawling with suspects and it's up to famous detective, Hercule Poirot, to solve the case..
Published Year: 1926.
